content.question: Which of the following most directly influenced the creation of policies such as those in the excerpt?

choices.label: Worry among enslavers that slavery was becoming less profitable.
Fear among enslavers of slave uprisings and other forms of resistance to slavery.
Enslavers’ concern for the safety and well-being of the enslaved persons under their control.
Enslavers’ claims that slavery was a morally benign and economically necessary institution.

content.answer: Fear among enslavers of slave uprisings and other forms of resistance to slavery.
